dcterms:creator: W. Li
Y. Xu
B. Tan
R. J. Piechocki
dcterms:description: The Doppler-Radar-2018 dataset was used in a pilot study employing Hidden Markov Models (HMM) to extract activity information from each Doppler sequence. The output of the HMM training was clustered using K-Means and K-Medoids, achieving high accuracy.
dcterms:title: Doppler-Radar-2018

dcterms:creator: W. Li
B. Tan
R. Piechocki
dcterms:description: The Doppler-spectogram dataset was collected in a laboratory setting to monitor human activities using passive radar. It includes five activities: walking, running, jumping, turning, and standing, with multiple repetitions for each activity.
dcterms:title: Doppler-spectogram dataset
